sentence: A pair of prominent Republicans broke the disturbing and rather deafening silence within the once-Grand Old Party over the weekend, calling out Reps. Paul Gosar and Marjorie Taylor Greene for participating in a conference catering to white nationalists.
author: Laurie Roberts
title: Where Sen. Mitt Romney sees 'morons', Arizona Gov. Doug Ducey sees allies

sentence: Senate lacks the votes to end early voting Which matters not a hoot to the Republican Party because this isn’t really about “election integrity.” It isn’t about “restoring voter confidence” in elections that Ward, Senate President Karen Fann, Rep. Paul Gosar, Sen. Wendy Rogers and other GOP leaders have sought at every turn to undermine.
author: Laurie Roberts
title: The Arizona Republican Party is so scared of you that it's suing to outlaw early voting

sentence: Lt. Gov of Idaho Janice McGeachin, Rep. Paul Gosar (AZ-04), and Arizona State Senator Wendy Rogers all appeared at the conference via video.
author: Zachary Mueller
title: A Weekend in Orlando Demonstrates the Republican Party is Going Down a Dark Path Towards White Nationalism

sentence: While Lake did not respond to questions about Rogers, she has not distanced herself from Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), who spoke at the same Nick Fuentes' white nationalist America First Political Action Conference in Florida.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Censured Republican is so toxic she’s become an issue in Arizona governor’s race: report

sentence: Speakers at the event included the founder and CEO of MyPillow, Mike Lindell and the controversial GOP Representative Paul Gosar, who's tied to the alleged white nationalist and anti-Semite Nick Fuentes of the "America First" podcast and political action conference.
author: Michael McDaniel
title: Az gov candidate Kari Lake holds Trump-inspired rally with Mike Lindell & Rep. Paul Gosar
